attributes.review: I really wanted to like It and give it A good rating but I truly don’t think this app is workable it glitches and makes my phone turn off. don’t buy this app it messes with your phone!!!!
attributes.title: Too glitchy

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to see what was going with this thing of a person, but there was nothing useful in here. I saw more action on twitter than his entire “presidency”. Also go support the rally Gen Z! You know what to do.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: i downloaded this app expecting to see cute little babies forced to wear trump onesies and i found an app that is filled with bigotry and a fat orange man.  i can’t allow my children to go on the app store knowing that these disgusting apps exist, please apple take this off the app store!
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: I downloaded the app with hopes of it covering all the doubts i had about trump and his 2020 election plan. I WAS DISAPPOINTED. The app completely throws you off when you open it and read everything and also serves no useful purpose whatsoever. TRASH.
attributes.title: Worst app ever.

attributes.review: This was the absolute worse thing ever. how does the president of the United States create a useless app that does nothing while hundreds of African Americans are fighting for BASIC human rights, children are in cages, and native Americans are going missing. Absolutely disgusting having him as a president
attributes.title: Trump for prison 2020🧚‍♂️✨

attributes.review: Wow I really thought President Trump would have a better social media and app development team. This app is constantly crashing and is now starting to affect my phone performance. Terrible. Just so disappointing.
attributes.title: Disappointing

attributes.review: This app is terrible I just added specificly 9,937,520 worth of Trump merch to my cart and this app was too glitchy and I can’t buy anything. It would be a shame if everything got out of stock and no one could buy anything.😤🤭😏DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!
attributes.title: 🧚🏼‍♀️✨Trump 2020, ✨💞but on a grave stone!!🧚🏼‍♀️

attributes.review: I woke up this morning to my dinosaurs being drugged by an mortifying orange cheeto monster😢my buddy Shakespeare called and said thy dinosaurs shall eat thy cheeto monster. A second after the cheeto monster was gone and my dinosaurs stomach seemed a bit bigger. I guess my bud Shakespeare was right after all 🥰✨
attributes.title: BÜŸEŠ

attributes.review: Terrible, many CRASHES left my phone glitching! Absolutely hate this app. Never ever will I consider re downloading it again! It needs so much more work. In fact, it needs to be REMOVED FROM THE APP STORE. I could give him app a 0 if I could!!!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE, AWFUL, MANY MANY CRASHES.

attributes.review: I downloaded this to see what our wonderful orange had in store only for this app to completely  glitch and when i go into it it takes me back to my home screen😭,not a good app dont download.
attributes.title: Not a good app
